member.summary: Used to keep track of icon groups.

member.summary: Provides a high level view of a native win32 resource that can be stored in the resources data directory of a portable executable (PE) image.

member.summary: Serializes the win32 resource to the provided root win32 resource data directory.

member.name: T:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FileFlags
member.summary: Provides members describing the attributes of the file in a version resource.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FileFlags.Debug
member.summary: Indicates the file contains debugging information or is compiled with debugging features enabled.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FileFlags.PreRelease
member.summary: Indicates the file is a development version and not a commercially released product.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FileFlags.Patched
member.summary: Indicates the file has been modified and is not identical to the original shipping file of the same version number.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FileFlags.PrivateBuild
member.summary: Indicates the file was not built using standard release procedures. If this flag is set, the StringFileInfo structure should contain a PrivateBuild entry.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FileFlags.InfoInferred
member.summary: Indicates the file's version structure was created dynamically; therefore, some of the members in this structure may be empty or incorrect. This flag should never be set in a file's VS_VERSIONINFO data.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FileFlags.SpecialBuild
member.summary: Indicates the file was built by the original company using standard release procedures but is a variation of the normal file of the same version number. If this flag is set, the StringFileInfo structure should contain a SpecialBuild entry.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FileFlags.ValidBitMask
member.summary: Provides a bitmask for all valid known bits that can be set.

member.summary: Indicates the operating system for which the file was designed is unknown to the system.

member.summary: Indicates the file was designed for 16-bit Windows.

member.summary: Indicates the file was designed for 16-bit OS/2.

member.summary: The signature value a FixedVersionInfo structure starts with.

member.summary: Reads a single fixed version info structure from an input stream.

member.summary: Gets or sets the file version number.

member.summary: Gets or sets the product version number.

member.name: P:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FixedVersionInfo.FileFlagsMask
member.summary: Gets or sets the bitmask that specifies the valid bits in . A bit is valid only if it was defined when the file was created.

member.name: P:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FixedVersionInfo.FileFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets the bitmask that specifies the attributes of the file.

member.summary: Gets or ses the operating system for which this file was designed.

member.name: P:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FixedVersionInfo.FileType
member.summary: Gets or sets the general type of file.

member.summary: Gets or sets the function of the file.

member.name: P:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.FixedVersionInfo.FileDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the binary creation date and time stamp

member.name: T:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringFileInfo
member.summary: Represents the organization of data in a file-version resource. It contains version information that can be displayed for a particular language and code page.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringFileInfo.StringFileInfoKey
member.summary: The name of the StringFileInfo entry.

member.summary: Reads a single StringFileInfo structure from the provided input stream.
member.param: The offset of the consumed header.
member.remarks: This function assumes the provided header was already consumed.

member.name: P:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringFileInfo.Tables
member.summary: Gets a collection of tables stored in this VarFileInfo structure, typically containing a list of languages that the application or DLL supports.

member.name: T:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable
member.summary: Represents the organization of data in a file-version resource. It contains language and code page formatting information for the strings specified by the Children member. A code page is an ordered character set.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.CommentsKey
member.summary: The name of the string describing the comments assigned to the executable file.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.CompanyNameKey
member.summary: The name of the string describing the name of the company that developed the executable file.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.FileDescriptionKey
member.summary: The name of the string describing the executable in such a way that it can be presented to users.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.FileVersionKey
member.summary: The name of the string describing the version of the file.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.InternalNameKey
member.summary: The name of the string describing the internal name of the file.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.LegalCopyrightKey
member.summary: The name of the string describing the copyright notices that apply to the file.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.LegalTrademarksKey
member.summary: The name of the string describing the trademark notices that apply to the file.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.OriginalFilenameKey
member.summary: The name of the string providing the original file name.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.PrivateBuildKey
member.summary: The name of the string describing by whom, where, and why this private version of the file was built.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.ProductNameKey
member.summary: The name of the string describing the name of the product with which this file is distributed.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.ProductVersionKey
member.summary: The name of the string describing the version of the product with which this file is distributed.

member.name: F:AsmResolver.PE.Win32Resources.Version.StringTable.SpecialBuildKey
member.summary: The name of the string describing how this version of the file differs from the normal version

member.summary: Reads a single StringTable structure from the provided input stream.

member.summary: Gets or sets the language identifier of this string table.

member.summary: Gets or sets the code page of this string table.

member.summary: Adds (or overrides) a field to the string table.

member.summary: Removes a single field from the string table by its name.

member.summary: The name of the Var entry.
